original_text: After David moved to Jerusalem from Hebron, he married more wives. He also took more slave wives to live with him. They gave birth to more sons and daughters for David.
korean_text: 다윗이 헤브론에서 올라온 후에 예루살렘에서 처첩들을 더 두었으므로 아들과 딸들이 또 다윗에게서 나니

sentences.original_text: After David moved to Jerusalem from Hebron
He also took more slave wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 더 많은 첩들을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They gave birth to more sons

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗을 위해 더 많은 딸들을 낳았습니다
